data.text: @dpantos @nebrbar Ya, nice. What about the single mom who depends on that rental income to keep her and her children's home? Screw you ambulance chasing Covid attorneys!

@MarkDetty @cappybagels @dpantos @nebrbar Stuff like this scares me because I own a home that I'm considering renting out when I move overseas. Im in the military. If they stop paying rent I would have to file bankruptcy because I couldn't afford both payments. Most landlords aren't rich. Many just own an extra property
@dpantos @nebrbar Compassion and sound judgment are two good reasons to support #DavidPantos for Douglas County Attorney.
@dpantos @nebrbar Good on you. I don’t care much for district attorneys but you are winning my vote by stopping these evictions.
@MaryFischer1 @dpantos @nebrbar He used the word professional not officer, So it might be a dispatcher or office staff, and I doubt the union would care.
@dpantos @nebrbar Retired law enforcement officer, huh? Evicted, huh?   Does  a certain law enforcement officers union know about this?

@MarkDetty @cappybagels @dpantos @nebrbar QtRUmplican politicians and their sycophants do not care about the average people.
They only care about rich  "christian" white guys.

@MarkDetty @dpantos @nebrbar How do you know the landlord is rich? Oh wait, you don’t.  They have a mortgage, bills, etc.  The GOP is for supporting Police Officers, but also the rule of law, which includes evictions.

@cappybagels @dpantos @nebrbar Just curious, isn't the stance of the GOP to protect families and police officers? I mean, I get that you're upset that an already rich person is getting screwed out of being slightly more rich. How does falling victim to shitty times translate to prioritizing criminal rights?

@dpantos @nebrbar A candidate for County Attorney attacking Property Owners, SMH.  Not surprising given the Democrat Party.  Prioritizing Criminal Rights over Citizens.  Soft-on-crime policies.   The next Chesa Boudin right here in Omaha! 👎🏽
